abstract: Students solve two problems each involving the motion of projectile objects, modeling the motion using quadratic equations. PLEASE NOTE: This activity can be assigned, but student responses will not be saved.
description:
Students solve two problems modeled by quadratic equations. One problem involves profits from a business and the other, water draining from a bathtub. Students graph quadratic equations and use their graphs to answer questions. Quadratic Word Problems Part 2 is the second of four activities for teaching and learning quadratic equations in algebra: Graphing Quadratic Equations; Quadratic Word Problems Part 1; Quadratic Word Problems Part 2; and Quadratic Functions in Vertex Form.

Â» Lesson Plan and Student Assessment documents are also available.

PLEASE NOTE: This activity can be assigned, but student responses will not be saved.
name: Quadratic Word Problems Part 2
